svg.text: Manage Users Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Manage Users
Actor(s):
Admin User
Description:
Comprehensive user oversight system allowing admins to manage user accounts,
review user reports, handle violations, and maintain platform community standards.
Preconditions:
1. Admin must be logged in with administrative privileges
2. Admin must have access to user management dashboard
Main Flow:
1. Admin accesses Users section from admin dashboard navigation
2. System displays user management interface with user reports queue
3. Admin views user reports filtered by status, category, and priority
4. Admin selects specific user report for detailed review
5. System displays report details: reporter, reported user, violation type, evidence
6. Admin investigates reported user's profile, match history, and behavior patterns
7. Admin determines appropriate action: resolve, investigate further, or escalate
8. Admin can take actions: warning, temporary suspension, permanent ban
9. Admin provides resolution notes and communicates with affected users
10. System updates report status and logs admin actions for audit trail
11. System sends notifications to relevant parties about resolution
12. Admin monitors user compliance and tracks repeat offenders
Alternative Flows:
A1. False report: Admin marks report as invalid and may warn false reporter
A2. Escalation needed: Admin forwards complex cases to higher authority
A3. User appeal: Admin reviews appeals against previous moderation decisions
A4. Bulk actions: Admin handles multiple similar violations efficiently
A5. Emergency suspension: Admin immediately suspends users for severe violations
